mapper.select: SELECT noticeNum, noticeWriter, noticeCategory, noticeTitle, noticeContent, noticeRegdate, noticeViews FROM ( SELECT rownum as rn, noticeNum, noticeWriter, noticeCategory, noticeTitle, noticeContent, noticeRegdate, noticeViews FROM ( SELECT noticeNum, noticeWriter, noticeCategory, noticeTitle, noticeContent, noticeRegdate, noticeViews FROM notice ORDER BY noticeRegdate DESC ) a where rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) )aa where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(noticeNum,noticeTitle,noticeContent,noticeCategory) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(NOTICENUM), 0) + 1 FROM NOTICE), #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent},#{noticeCategory} )
mapper.select: select noticeNum, noticeWriter, noticeTitle, noticeContent, noticeRegdate, noticeViews, noticeCategory from notice where noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET noticeViews = NVL(noticeViews, 0) + 1 WHERE noticeNum = #{noticeNum}
